summary: porcine epidemic diarrhea virus (PEDV) has caused devastating enteric diseases in the us and several countries in Asia. only insufficient information is available on currently circulating PEDV strains in Europe and their impact on the european swine industry. isolates found in the 1980s were closely related to a PEDV variant found in the us in 2014. the present case report indicates that variant strains of PEDV could cause high mortality in suckling piglets.
